Package utilities

Class Task

java.lang.Object
utilities.Task
public class Task extends Object
Author:
Anupama Hazarika This class stores information about a task whether the task is done or not. It allows the getting and setting of its various fields and has a String description which can be set by the user and then displayed to them.

      Constructor method. Constructor method that uses its arguments to set the initial value of the various fields in this class.

      dueDate - A Date object representing the date the task is due.
